div.head: The range of an arquebus
div.ab: The proportion is of the fowling piece is 4 kingâ€™s feet long & the ball xviii deniers, the charge vi deniers of powder, its range iiiixx pans & 3 feet lxi & a half, two inches & a few lines, which is the Paris aulne. The medium hackbut, which is the usual one & the easiest, carries a ball of xv deniers, v deniers of powder & a range of lx paces.
